BVR metals 0.1 m
```{r}
metals <- read.csv("https://pasta.lternet.edu/package/data/eml/edi/455/7/e71d70cac1650610e6a3fbbf7928007f")%>%
  mutate(Date = as.Date(DateTime))

metals$Date_22 = metals$Date
year(metals$Date_22)=2022
year(metals$Date)[year(metals$Date)==22]<-2022
metals$Year = as.factor(year(metals$Date))

metals[metals$Date=="2022-05-09",]

metals_surf = metals%>%
  filter(Reservoir == "BVR",
         Depth_m == 0.1,
         Site==50)
  
#Additional QAQC needed (Days where soluble>total)
metals_final = metals_surf%>%
  mutate(TFe_mgL = ifelse(Date=="2022-05-09",metals_surf$SFe_mgL[metals_surf$Date=="2022-05-09"],TFe_mgL),
         TMn_mgL = ifelse(Date=="2022-05-09",metals_surf$SMn_mgL[metals_surf$Date=="2022-05-09"],TMn_mgL),
         SFe_mgL = ifelse(Date=="2022-05-09",metals_surf$TFe_mgL[metals_surf$Date=="2022-05-09"],SFe_mgL),
         SMn_mgL = ifelse(Date=="2022-05-09",metals_surf$TMn_mgL[metals_surf$Date=="2022-05-09"],SMn_mgL),
         TFe_mgL = ifelse(Date=="2022-06-07",NA,TFe_mgL),
         TMn_mgL = ifelse(Date=="2022-06-07",NA,TMn_mgL))

write.csv(metals_final,"./Processed_data/Metals at 0.1m.csv",row.names=F)
```
